subject: Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: In making the transition from a doctrinaire flyrodder to an all-around big fish hunter on all kinds of tackle, Trevor Gowdy became the compleatest (Izaak Walton’s rendering) angler I know.
snippet: In making the transition from a doctrinaire flyrodder to an all-around big fish hunter on all kinds of tackle, Trevor Gowdy became the compleatest (Izaak Walton’s rendering) angler I know.
